name: cams_radiation_service_v3_2_all_sky_irradiation
title: CAMS Radiation Service v3.2 all-sky irradiation (derived from satellite data)
description: A time-series of solar radiation received on horizontal plane and plane always normal to the sun rays at ground level. Returns the global, beam and diffuse irradiations integrated over a selected time step, for a selected location (Meteosat Second Generation satellite coverage) and a selected period.
